Event.name: Making_arrangements
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> performs a series of unspecified tasks to plan for an <fen>Event</fen> to take place at a <fen>Scheduled_time</fen> and <fen>Place</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex>'ve <t>arranged</t> <fex name="Event">a breakfast meeting</fex> <fex name="Bene">for you</fex> <fex name="Scheduled_time">tomorrow morning</fex> <fex name="Event">with Mr. Huntsberger</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">Kevin and Beth</fex> <t>organized</t> <fex name="Event">the graduate student conference</fex> <fex name="Scheduled_time">this year</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who makes arrangements for the <fen>Event</fen> to take place at a <fen>Time</fen> and <fen>Place</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Lucy</fex> <t>organized</t> a playdate for little Michael and Marcy.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Event
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The incident for which the <fen>Agent</fen> has made arrangements.
<ex>I've already <t>made</t> <fex name="Event">vacation</fex> <t>arrangements</t>.</ex>
<ex>Josie <t>organized</t> <fex name="Event">the conference</fex> last year.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Beneficiary
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person for whom the <fen>Event</fen> was arranged.
<ex>Ms. Moneypenny will <t>arrange</t> that <fex name="Bene">for you</fex>, Mr. Bond.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The frequency with which the <fen>Agent</fen> organizes the <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>Silvia <t>made</t> the travel <t>arrangements</t> for the conference <fex name="Freq">every year</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The way in which the <fen>Agent</fen> makes the arrangements for the <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>Max <fex name="Manner">hastily</fex> <t>made</t> <t>arrangements</t> to go see the therapist tomorrow.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The means used by the <fen>Agent</fen> to make arrangements for the <fen>Event</fen> to take place.
<ex>Lily <t>made</t> <t>arrangements</t> <fex name="Means">via email</fex> to see the venue.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location at which the <fen>Agent</fen> has made arrangements for the <fen>Event</fen> to take place.
<ex>Lionel <t>organized</t> a meeting <fex name="Place">at the local pub</fex> to discuss the bleak future of our organization.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen>'s motivation for arranging the <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>Lionel <t>organized</t> a meeting at the local pub <fex name="Purpose">to discuss the bleak future of our organization</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The cause for arranging the <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>Marcy <t>made</t> the <t>arrangements</t> this time <fex name="Explanation">because Millie was out of town</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Scheduled_time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time for which the <fen>Agent</fen> has arranged the <fen>Event</fen>.
<ex>I've <t>put</t> <t>together</t> a luncheon <fex name="Scheduled_time">for 12:30</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the time at which the arrangements are made.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: make arrangements.idio
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make preparations for an event

lexUnit.name: organize.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make preparations for an event or activity

lexUnit.name: set up.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make preparations for an event or activity

lexUnit.name: put together.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to organize an activity or event
